casebody.data:
The TEXAS COMPANY, Appellee, v. LOU HALPERIN’S STATIONS, Inc., Louis Halperin and Joseph Halperin, Appellants. No. 44. Circuit Court, of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 2, 1936. Wilzin & Halperin, of New York City (Michael Halperin and Robert Morris, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Albert E. Van Dusen, of New York City, for appellee.

Before AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment (IS F.Supp. 404) affirmed.
